MAN.TITLE: lyap

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : real square matrices, C must be symmetric

DESCRIPTION.P: solves the continuous time or discrete time matrix Lyapunov matrix equation:
DESCRIPTION.VERBATIM: A'*X + X*A = C ( flag='c' ) A'*X*A - X = C ( flag='d' ) Note that a unique solution exist if and only if an eigenvalue of A is not an eigenvalue of -A (flag='c') or 1 over an eigenvalue of A (flag='d').
